ygData.subject: Re: Listen, here. Listen well.
ygData.msgSnippet: Joshua Bednarz wrote:  ... Yeah the were much more immature than i ve got a secret and I m not telling nyah nyah (rough paraphrase of Joshua s last
ygData.messageBody:
Joshua Bednarz wrote:
<snip>
>so I'm not going to go giving
> away the clue I was told, especially after the rude, immature, derogatory
> comments that were made about me.

Yeah the were much more immature than "i've got a secret and I'm not
telling nyah nyah" (rough paraphrase of Joshua's last message)
>I will tell you this though. Waste not a
> plat more on trying combinations. You are not only wasting your money, but
> you are wasting your time. Search the world, high and low, search the world
> above and below...
> This is all I will say. It's been nice being part of this list. I though you
> were a bunch of decent people. Your coments have changed my mind. I will no
> longer be a part of this list as you wish. It's been fun guys, and thanks
> for all the fish.
>

Woohoo one Troll boy down, half a billion to go! Listen pallie you sign
up for the list, which has the purpose of *sharing* info, than turn
around and say you wont share your info with the rest of us, well good
riddance to you we don't need or want your kind (note I speak only for
myself and do not necessarily represent the rest of the list (though I
would bet I do speak for a majority of them))


> Sniffledoo Copperheart 18th Common Squire of The Scarlet Blade
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist announces "FRIENDS & FAMILY!"
> For details, including our weekly drawing, go to
> http://www.onelist.com/info/onereachsplash3.html
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
/Nosferatu aka Phebos gnome enchantress (the good and kindhearted who
will always share secrets with nice people)
